item.title: 沙特基金 Ardian 提议以 33 亿英镑收购希思罗机场 38% 的股份
item.description: 私募股权公司 Ardian 和沙特阿拉伯财富基金提出以 32.6 亿英镑（42.6 亿美元）的价格收购希思罗机场 37.6% 的股份，在其他股东加入 Ferrovial SE 出售股份的行列后，这项修订后的交易增加了他们对伦敦枢纽的承诺。【原文：Private equity firm Ardian and Saudi Arabia’s wealth fund have offered to buy 37.6% of Heathrow Airport for £3.26 billion ($4.26 billion), in a revised deal that increases their commitment to the London hub after other shareholders joined Ferrovial SE in selling.】

item.title: 牛肉价格昂贵，养猪户打赌消费者会吃更多猪肉
item.description: 美国养猪业者打赌，随着牛肉价格飙升，手头拮据的消费者会烤更多的猪肉，吃更多的意大利辣香肠，从而为这个挣扎了一年多的行业带来转机。【原文：American hog farmers are betting cash-strapped consumers will grill more pork and eat more pepperoni as beef prices surge, feeding a turnaround for an industry that’s been struggling for more than a year.】

item.title: 建设核电对世界私人投资者来说是一座遥不可及的桥梁
item.description: 下一代核反应堆需要由纳税人出资，因为私人投资者不愿意承担建设新核电站的风险。【原文：The next generation of nuclear reactors will need to be financed by taxpayers because private investors aren’t willing to bear the risks associated with building new plants.】

item.title: 政治推动南非银行股飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于政治领导人同意结成广泛联盟组建下届政府，南非银行股指数周五跃升至创纪录水平。【原文：An index of South African bank stocks jumped to a record Friday as political leaders agreed to a broad alliance to form the next government.】

item.title: 无法交易"：巴西掉期利率市场剧烈波动
item.description: 巴西应该是押注掉期利率下降的投资者的天堂。巴西的实际利率高得惊人，而通胀率却在下降，因此，从利率下降中获益的交易不在话下。【原文：Brazil should be a paradise for investors betting on lower swap rates. With stunningly high real rates and inflation on the decline, a trade that benefits from falling interest rates is a no-brainer.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为法国市场动荡无需恐慌
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧洲中央银行官员认为没有理由对过去几天席卷法国的市场动荡感到恐慌。【原文：European Central Bank officials see no cause for alarm in the market turbulence that has engulfed France in the past few days, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲经济动荡不安，巨型科技股、国债无视泡沫与赤字的末日论调
item.description:
随着美国在其他地方表现出色，避风港交易显而易见

。【原文：

With the US outperforming everywhere else, the haven trades are clear

】

item.title: 可再生能源激增挤走原子发电厂，法国电力下滑
item.description: 由于需求下降和可再生能源产量激增，促使一些核反应堆关闭电源，法国电价转为负值。【原文：French electricity prices turned negative as a drop in demand and surging renewables output prompted some nuclear reactors to power down.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称欧元区通货紧缩将是艰难的
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，尽管未来几个月的进展将是崎岖不平的，但欧洲中央银行有信心走在通胀率恢复到 2% 的正确道路上。【原文：The European Central Bank is confident that it’s on the right path to return inflation to 2%, even though progress in the next few months will be bumpy, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚计划允许外国银行收购当地贷款机构
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚部长会议批准了一项法案，为海外银行收购国内贷款机构的股份铺平了道路，标志着长达三十年之久的将外国人拒之于银行业门外的政策宣告结束。【原文：Ethiopia’s Council of Ministers approved a bill that would pave the way for overseas banks to acquire stakes in domestic lenders, marking the end of a three-decade-old policy to keep foreigners out of the industry.】

item.title: 巴拿马运河凭借供水计划和一些运气避免了航运危机
item.description: 巴拿马运河成功抵御了一场可能危及每年 2700 亿美元全球贸易的航运危机。它做到了这一点，靠的是精心的水资源管理和一点点运气。【原文：The Panama Canal has managed to ward off a shipping crisis that threatened to upend $270 billion a year in global trade. It did so with careful water management — and a little bit of luck.】

item.title: PG&E 认为 "利用率不足 "的电网已为电力需求激增做好准备
item.description: 加利福尼亚州最大的公用事业公司 PG&E Corp. 首席执行官 Patti Poppe 表示，该公司预计在不大幅增加发电厂的情况下满足激增的电力需求。【原文：PG&E Corp., California’s biggest utility, expects to meet surging demand for electricity without significantly adding to its fleet of power plants, according to Chief Executive Officer Patti Poppe.】

item.title: 沙特有望在泽连斯基访问乌克兰后出席乌克兰峰会
item.description: 在沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基总统本周早些时候突然访问沙特阿拉伯之后，一些国家的官员预计沙特阿拉伯将出席在瑞士举行的乌克兰战争问题峰会。【原文：Officials from several countries expect Saudi Arabia to attend a summit in Switzerland on the war in Ukraine after a surprise visit by President Volodymyr Zelenskiy to the kingdom earlier this week.】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆获胜为阿姆洛赢得了提升国家公用事业的又一次机会
item.description: 当选总统克劳迪娅-谢恩鲍姆在墨西哥大选中大获全胜，为即将卸任的总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔争取对该国能源行业施加更多政治控制注入了新的活力。【原文：President-elect Claudia Sheinbaum’s sweep of Mexico’s election is breathing new life into outgoing President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador’s bid to exert more political control over the country’s energy sector.】

item.title: 微策略公司将可转换债券销售额提高 40% 至 7 亿美元
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. increased its convertible note offering by 40% to $700 million, a day after the enterprise software maker announced plans to use the proceeds raised to buy more Bitcoin.】

item.title: 整天交易加密货币的真实感受
item.description:
如何利用数字货币赚大钱和赔大钱。【原文：

How to make and lose a fortune with digital money. 

】

item.title: 支出争端令欧盟最高职位有望获得者卡拉斯陷入防卫
item.description: 爱沙尼亚总理卡亚-卡拉斯（Kaja Kallas）回击了有关她的政府无视增加军费以遏制俄罗斯潜在入侵的批评。【原文：Estonian Prime Minister Kaja Kallas pushed back against criticism that her administration has disregarded a request for additional military spending needed to deter a potential Russian invasion.】

item.title: 印度大选后外汇储备再创新高
item.description: 印度的外汇储备上周攀升至历史新高，尽管央行在大选结果出人意料之后采取了干预措施以保护卢比。【原文：India’s foreign exchange reserves climbed to a record high last week even as the central bank intervened to protect the rupee amid a slump after surprising election results.】

item.title: 美国养老金与海湾基金争夺私募股权交易的先机
item.description: 斯科特-陈（Scott Chan）花了两年时间说服他在加利福尼亚州教师退休系统（California State Teachers' Retirement System）的上司，腾出更多现金用于与全球最大的私募股权公司一起进行利润丰厚的投资。【原文：It took Scott Chan two years to convince his bosses at the California State Teachers’ Retirement System to free up more cash for lucrative investments alongside the world’s biggest private equity firms.】

item.title: 非洲人国民大会南非商业中心豪登省省长再次当选
item.description: 南非经济中心豪登省的立法者再次选举非洲人国民大会的帕尼亚扎-莱苏菲（Panyaza Lesufi）为该地区的省长。【原文：Lawmakers in South Africa’s Gauteng province, the nation’s economic hub, reelected the African National Congress’s Panyaza Lesufi as premier of the region.】

item.title: 牛市退却，美元二月以来最佳连涨势头受到威胁
item.description: 虽然美元有望创下 2 月份以来的最佳单周涨幅，这得益于美联储与全球同行不同的 "更高更长期 "利率政策，但货币交易员们押注美国的收益率优势不会持久。【原文：While the dollar is on track for its best run of weekly gains since February, helped by a Federal Reserve higher-for-longer interest-rate policy that diverges from global peers, currency traders are betting the US yield advantage won’t last.】

item.title: 天然气市场为动荡夏季的价格飙升做好准备
item.description:
紧张的供应和强劲的亚洲需求为市场的波动埋下了伏笔。【原文：

Tight supply and robust Asian demand are setting the stage for a volatile market.

】

item.title: 市场欢呼南非向广泛政府联盟迈进
item.description: 南非股市反弹，兰特升值，一反全球风险资产大跌的颓势，投资者对竞争对手政党达成协议支持西里尔-拉马福萨连任总统欢欣鼓舞。【原文：South African stocks rallied and the rand gained, defying the global selloff in risk assets, as investors cheered an agreement between rival political parties to back the reelection of Cyril Ramaphosa as president.】

item.title: 据说高盛的马斯里将离职，转投阿布扎比的 1,050 亿美元基金
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，凯撒-马斯里（Caesar Maasry）已辞去高盛集团新兴市场跨资产研究主管和董事总经理的职务，并将加入一家投资公司，该公司的投资者包括阿布扎比财富基金ADQ。【原文：Caesar Maasry has quit as the head of emerging-market cross-asset research and a managing director at Goldman Sachs Group Inc., and is set to join an investment firm that counts Abu Dhabi wealth fund ADQ among its investors, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市屡创新高，欧洲股指却步履维艰，苹果公司再次超越微软，日本央行引发日元新一轮疲软。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Record-setting US stocks stand out against struggling European indexes, Apple overtakes Microsoft again and the BOJ sparks new yen weakness. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: PGIM 坚持看跌国债的观点，押注美联储仍可能加息
item.description: 虽然债券交易员重燃了对美联储降息的押注，但 PGIM Fixed Income 表示，央行实际上可能会重新倾向于加息。【原文：While bond traders have rekindled bets for interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, PGIM Fixed Income says the central bank may actually lean back toward a hike.】

item.title: 德意志银行因西班牙衍生产品销售遭罚款
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）向客户出售金融衍生品，但客户后来表示不了解这些产品，并因此蒙受了巨大损失，德意志银行正准备在西班牙接受高达 1,000 万欧元（1,070 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is bracing for a fine of as much as €10 million ($10.7 million) in Spain after it sold derivatives to clients who later said they didn’t understand the products and suffered steep losses as a result.】

item.title: 特斯拉和埃克森股东大会见证挪威 17 亿美元基金的募集之声
item.description: 特斯拉公司和埃克森美孚公司最近召开的股东大会标志着挪威主权财富为其投票决定辩护的方式发生了重大变化。【原文：The recent shareholder meetings of Tesla Inc. and Exxon Mobil Corp marked a step change in how Norway’s sovereign wealth justifies its voting decisions.】

item.title: Transnet 将为大众汽车和南非其他汽车制造商提供更多铁路服务
item.description: Transnet SOC Ltd.表示，该公司正在商谈在东开普省格格贝哈港口与该国商业中心豪登省之间增开列车，以更好地连接这两个汽车制造中心。【原文：Transnet SOC Ltd. said it’s in talks to run additional trains between a port in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape province and the country’s commercial hub of Gauteng to better link the two automotive manufacturing hubs.】

item.title: 欧洲柴油市场因努力吸引美国供应而更加看涨
item.description: 欧洲柴油市场正在出现紧缩迹象，柴油相对原油的溢价达到了两个月来的最高点。【原文：Europe’s diesel market is showing signs of tightening, with the fuel’s premium over crude oil reaching a two-month high.】
